description:
AJKB-05 EMBROIDERED CHIFFON 3 PCS

By Pcs: 3 Pcs Peshwas: Chiffon Trouser: Silk Dupatta: Chiffon Color: Purple

Drenched in the vibrant hue of magenta, this Peshwas radiates a bold and regal presence. Adorned with intricate antique gold zariwork that weaves a tapestry of elegance, it captures the essence of timeless beauty. The 3mm cupped sequins catch the light like tiny jewels, adding a playful sparkle that dances with every movement. This enchanting ensemble is paired with an embroidered dupatta, evoking the grandeur of a royal celebration, making this outfit a striking statement that commands attention.Â 
DESIGN DETAILS:

Embroidered front bodice on chiffon
Embroidered back bodice on chiffon
1.25 meter embroidered border for bodice hem on chiffon
16 embroidered Kalis for peshwas on chiffon
5 meter embroidered border for ghera on chiffon
Pair of embroidered sleeves with border on chiffon
2.5 meter embroidered dupatta with 4-side border on chiffon
1.5 meter wide-width silk for trouser
